text: Buried Alive: The Elements of Love is a young adult book of poetry by Ralph Fletcher, with pictures by Andrew Moore. It was first published in 1996. == Summary == This book is a collection of thirty six free verse poems about teenage love divided into four elements: earth, water, air and fire. == Notes == == References == * * == Outside webpages == *Ralph Fletcher's website Category:1996 books Category:Poetry books Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher
title: Buried Alive (book)
